program.name: plotutils
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix5*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" CXX=xlC CXXFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ARGS="--enable-libplotter --with-motif" ;; *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ARGS="--with-motif" ;; *-osf5*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std -msym -readonly_strings -ieee" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--enable-libplotter --with-motif" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -std -msym -readonly_strings -ieee" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--enable-libplotter --with-motif" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z -Wp,-H16384 +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="+O2 -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ARGS="--enable-libplotter --with-athena=/usr/contrib/X11R6 \ --x-includes=/usr/include/X11R6 --x-libraries=/usr/lib/X11R6 \ --with-motif" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z -Wp,-H16384 +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," X_INCLUDES="/usr/include/X11R6" X_LIBRARIES="/usr/lib/X11R6" ARGS="--with-athena=/usr/contrib/X11R6 \ --x-includes=/usr/include/X11R6 --x-libraries=/usr/lib/X11R6 \ --with-motif" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--enable-libplotter --with-motif" ;; *-linux[89]*|*-linuxe3*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ARGS="--enable-libplotter" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CC_LD_RT="-R" ARGS="--with-motif" ;; *-solaris2.5.1) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ARGS="--with-motif=/usr/dt" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=generic" CC_LD_RT="-R" ARGS="--with-motif" ;; esac
rm -f config.cache ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${CC_LD_RT}${LIBPNG_LIB}:${ZLIB_LIB}:${XPM_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --enable-shared --enable-static \ --enable-libxmi --with-zlib=${ZLIB} --with-libpng=${LIBPNG} \ --with-xpm=${XPM} --datadir="${_datadir}" ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

platform.name: HP-UX 11.00
platform.para: Patch PHSS_22543 providing the libstd_v2 Standard C++ library is required as the HP C++ compiler was used.
